title: I'm No Fool with Fire (Captioned)
brief_description: Host, Jiminy Cricket, describes the three elements needed to start a fire and warns of ways fires can start through carelessness. This safety classic goes behind-the-scenes at a real fire station where a fire fighter helps three youngsters review fire safety procedures.
